author: Special Correspondent
text:
A total of 24, 135 students, including 13, 261 girls, will appear for this year’s higher secondary public examinations in Virudhunagar district. The examinations will be held from March 4 to April 1.

Inspection

The Collector, V. Rajaraman, accompanied by S. Karmegam, secretary, Tamil Nadu Textbooks and Educational Services Corporation, and A. Pugazhendi, Chief Educational Officer, inspected the centres where question papers for the examinations are stored in Sattur, Sivakasi, Srivilliputtur and Rajapalayam on Tuesday, according to an official press release.
title: 24, 135 students to write Plus Two examinations
